description:
Mason Wyler wrote me saying he wanted to do some scenes for me, and would Zack Randall be available?
I don't often have models write me asking to work with other models, but when Zack said he thought it would be a lot of fun (and a welcome break from the very nervous straight guys he's been breaking in) we made magic happen.
This is one of those lucky fly on the wall videos where I just kind of sat back and watched two guys have wild monkey sex.
A great video as Zack busts several feet and hits Mason square in the face (Making Zack chuckle a bit).
You can't beat the genuine intensity and chemistry in this one!
title: Mason Wyler & Zack Randall - Wrapped
